Articles.Content: I don't think willitstimothy knows what tidally locked means. But anyway, I'm wondering what effects heat will have on your Kerbals on EVA. Will they get sunburn? Hahaha

I don't think willitstimothy knows what tidally locked means. But anyway, I'm wondering what effects heat will have on your Kerbals on EVA. Will they get sunburn? Hahaha

For now their ship will incinerate if they get into a med/low orbit.. So yes sun factor 5'000'000 is advised..

For all who did not recognised it:

Wiki has updates of the new bodies - basicly the names - no datas until now:

http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Celestials
Can silisko please show off a picture of a probe entering the atmosphere of Meander? Pleaseeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!

I'm one of the 00.0000001% then I guess.

Yes me to.

Tonight, I dug up the old BACE pack and constructed this:

DunaLab! The first space station scheduled to be placed in orbit around another planet.

Tonight, I dug up the old BACE pack and constructed this:

- snip-

DunaLab! The first space station scheduled to be placed in orbit around another planet.

Wow that's cool!

I can't wait to see it up in the sky orbiting another planet.

But how you gonna get a thing so big to another planet with the rockets parts we got now? Or docking, or CFG editing, or the use of the new parts, or using the dev tool.

Also, I was thinking when I saw the picture, would it be not wonderfull if those be stock parts and functional (like the solar panels for power for in the inflateble thing where kerbals can be IVA'ing)?

Edited September 1, 2012 by kevinlacht
does anyone know, will the gas giant be the only planet with an atmosphere? it would be great to have a landing like on mars.
Pretty sweet, Nova. What are those things hanging off the bottom of the inflatable hab, if I may?

Pretty sweet, Nova. What are those things hanging off the bottom of the inflatable hab, if I may?

They look like things from Probodobodyne to me.

Tonight, I dug up the old BACE pack and constructed this:

DunaLab! The first space station scheduled to be placed in orbit around another planet.

Space Windmill.. But wheres the rest of the LV?

Damn spoiler tags have all gone changed

So there's no compatibility issues with that old pack? Cool.

Sorry for off topic but spoilers are done like this now:

[spoiler='something goes here'] text [/spoiler]

does anyone know, will the gas giant be the only planet with an atmosphere? it would be great to have a landing like on mars.

Actually, every planet will have an atmosphere, however thin.
actualy Eve will have a thicker atmosphere that kerbin
No one said it will be bigger they just stated it would be more dense, big difference.

does anyone know, will the gas giant be the only planet with an atmosphere? it would be great to have a landing like on mars.

Moho - very thin atmosphere

Eve - denser than Kerbin's

Kerbin - herpderp

Duna - thinner than Kerbin's

Jool - much much bigger than the other planets', go too deep and your ship implodes
KSP is a game quite addictive, I wonder when the new 0.17 updates will be released
When it's ready. We don't want it to be rushed:)

When it's ready. We don't want it to be rushed:)

I know, I also do not want anyone to rush either , this game is just very addictive, and now they have added a new planet, I'm going to improve my astrophysics and send a probe to a grand tour trough the Kerbal system

I could then record the amazing video, then certainly everyone subscribed to my channel on YouTube But I think I would have to buy a terabyte hard drive, because, unfortunately, the files created by Fraps take an awful lot of HDD space

I know, I also do not want anyone to rush either , this game is just very addictive, and now they have added a new planet, I'm going to improve my astrophysics and send a probe to a grand tour trough the Kerbal system

I could then record the amazing video, then certainly everyone subscribed to my channel on YouTube But I think I would have to buy a terabyte hard drive, because, unfortunately, the files created by Fraps take an awful lot of HDD space

not just one new planet, but i think 4 in this update, not to mention all the moons coming with them. and there will be even more in upcoming updates.

not just one new planet, but i think 4 in this update, not to mention all the moons coming with them. and there will be even more in upcoming updates.

Pretty sure thats what he meant. You cant exactly do a grand tour with only 2 planets now can you...

KSP is a game quite addictive, I wonder when the new 0.17 updates will be released

I don't want it to be rushed, but judging from the Planned changes, it shouldn't be much longer. One or two major changes left.
